text: Different kinds of clinicians " Profession | Eduaon | Tammg | Clinical Psychologist * College degree Supervised research and/or training in » Graduate school in clinical psychotherapy techniques, psychological psychology to earn a doctorate testing, and the diagnosis of mental health (PhD or PsyD; requires 5-8 years disorders after college degree) Counseling * College degree Supervised training in assessment, counseling, Psychologist » Graduate school in counseling and therapy techniques psychology or education to earn a doctorate (PhD or EdD; requires 4— 6 years after college degree) Licensed Professional * College degree Supervised training in assessment, counseling, Counselor * Graduate school to earn a master’s | and therapy techniques degree in counseling (requires 3-5 years after college degree)
